mapper.select: SELECT qchru.fUuid AS 'uuid', qchru.fQZOperationTypeUuid AS 'qzOperationTypeUuid', qchru.fStandardSpecies AS 'standardSpecies', qchru.fStartKeywordCount AS 'startKeywordCount', qchru.fEndKeywordCount AS 'endKeywordCount', qchru.fAmount AS 'amount', qchru.fCreatetime AS 'createTime', qchru.fUpdatetime AS 'updateTime' FROM t_qz_charge_rule qchru WHERE qchru.fQZOperationTypeUuid = #{qzOperationTypeUuid} order by qchru.fStartKeywordCount
